level.text: A court of the District of Columbia having jurisdiction over the controversy and the parties may enforce an agreement to arbitrate.
An agreement to arbitrate providing for arbitration in the District of Columbia confers exclusive jurisdiction on the court to enter judgment on an award under this chapter.

level.heading: Section References
level.text: This section is referenced in ยง 16-4404.

level.heading: Legislative History of Law 17-111
level.text: For Law 17-111, see notes following ยง 16-4401.

level.heading: Editor's Notes
level.text: Uniform Law: This section is based upon ยง 26 of the Uniform Arbitration Act (2000).
